meanings.definition: Having many different parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The multifarious colors of the rainbow painted a beautiful sky.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with multifarious flowers of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The multifarious ingredients in the soup created a surprising burst of flavors.
meanings.sent4: Her multifarious talents shone brightly in various fields of art and science.
meanings.sent5: The multifarious sounds of the bustling city made it a vibrant place to live.

meanings.sent1: The multifarious cultures in the city made it a melting pot of traditions.
meanings.sent2: His multifarious interests ranged from painting to skydiving.
meanings.sent3: The multifarious menu at the restaurant offered something for everyone.
meanings.sent4: The multifarious paths in the forest led to unexpected discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The multifarious opinions in the debate highlighted the complexity of the issue.
